Package com.unitedbankingservices

Interface Sink<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the cash to be transported.
All Known Implementing Classes:
BanknoteDispensationSlot, BanknoteInsertionSlot, BanknoteStorageUnit, BanknoteValidator, CoinDispenserAR, CoinSlot, CoinStorageUnit, CoinTray, CoinValidator, UnidirectionalChannel
public interface Sink<T>
Represents an abstract device that can receive cash.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    hasSpace()
    Returns whether the sink has space for at least one more item of cash.
    void
    receive(T cash)
    Places the indicated cash into the sink.

  • Method Details

    • receive

      void receive(T cash) throws TooMuchCashException, DisabledException
      Places the indicated cash into the sink. Requires power.
      Parameters:
      cash - The cash to place in the sink.
      Throws:
      TooMuchCashException - If the sink has no space for the cash.
      DisabledException - If the sink is currently disabled.

    • hasSpace

      boolean hasSpace()
      Returns whether the sink has space for at least one more item of cash. Requires power.
      Returns:
      true if the sink can accept an item of cash; false otherwise.
